items.description_english: Causes a quake\nthat has no effect\non flying foes.
items.description_german: Starkes Beben hat\nkeinen Einfluss auf\nfliegende Gegner.

items.description_english: The more the user\nlikes you, the more\npowerful this move.
items.description_german: Je beliebter der\nTrainer, desto grö-\nßer die Wirkung.

items.description_english: Digs underground\nthe 1st turn, then\nstrikes next turn.
items.description_german: Erst gräbt sich An-\ngreifer ein, dann\nerfolgt Angriff.

items.description_english: A powerful psychic\nattack that may\nlower SP. DEF.
items.description_german: Starke PSYCHO-At-\ntacke, die SP. VERT.\nsenken kann.

items.description_english: Hurls a dark lump\nat the foe. It may\nlower SP. DEF.
Destroys barriers\nlike LIGHT SCREEN\nand causes damage.
Creates illusory\ncopies to enhance\nelusiveness.
Creates a wall of\nlight that weakens\nphysical attacks.
items.description_german: Wand aus Licht, die\nphysische Atta-\ncken schwächt.

items.description_english: Zaps the foe with a\njolt of electricity\nthat never misses.
items.description_german: Fügt Gegner einen\nStromschlag zu,\nder nie verfehlt.

items.description_english: Looses a stream of\nfire that may burn\nthe foe.
Hurls sludge at the\nfoe. It may poison\nthe foe.
items.description_german: Bewirft Gegner mit\nMatsch, der ihn\nvergiften kann.

items.description_english: Causes a sandstorm\nthat hits the foe\nover several turns.
A powerful fire\nattack that may\nburn the foe.
Stops the foe from\nmoving with rocks.\nMay lower SPEED.
An extremely fast\nattack that can't\nbe avoided.
items.description_german: Eine extrem schnel-\nle Attacke, die\nunausweichlich ist.

items.description_english: Prevents the foe\nfrom using the same\nmove in a row.
Raises ATTACK when\npoisoned, burned,\nor paralyzed.
Adds an effect to\nattack depending\non the location.
The user sleeps for\n2 turns to restore\nhealth and status.
items.description_german: POKéMON schläft\n2 Runden. Füllt KP\nund heilt Status.

items.description_english: Makes it tough to\nattack a foe of the\nopposite gender.
items.description_german: Erschwert Angriff\nauf Gegner des an-\nderen Geschlechts.

items.description_english: While attacking,\nit may steal the\nfoe's held item.
items.description_german: Beim Angriff wird\nItem des Gegners\nevtl. gestohlen.

items.description_english: Spreads hard-edged\nwings and slams\ninto the foe.
Switches abilities\nwith the foe on the\nturn this is used.
Steals the effects\nof the move the foe\nis trying to use.
Enables full-power\nattack, but sharply\nlowers SP. ATK.
Attacks the foe\nwith sharp blades\nor claws.
Flies up on the\nfirst turn, then\nattacks next turn.
items.description_german: PKMN fliegt hoch,\ndann erfolgt rasan-\nter Luftangriff.

items.description_english: Creates a huge\nwave, then crashes\nit down on the foe.
items.description_german: Eine riesige Flut-\nwelle ergießt sich\nüber dem Gegner.

items.description_english: Builds enormous\npower, then slams\nthe foe.
Looses a powerful\nblast of light that\nreduces accuracy.
A rock-crushingly\ntough attack that\nmay lower DEFENSE.
Attacks the foe\nwith enough power\nto climb waterfalls.
Dives underwater\nthe 1st turn, then\nattacks next turn.
items.description_german: PKMN taucht ab,\ndann erfolgt An-\ngriff aus der Tiefe.
